title: Final Drive/Eccentric Rear Hub and Bearings - Inspection

body.body: Final Drive/Eccentric Rear Hub and Bearings - Inspection
The eccentric hub is a sealed for life unit.
It is recommended to lubricate the bearings as instructed in the service maintenance schedule.
If the eccentric hub bearings are worn or rough running, the eccentric rear hub and bearings must be replaced as an assembly.
Thoroughly clean all components and inspect for damage, wear etc. Renew as necessary.
Pay particular attention to the condition of the cush rubbers, examining for splits, damage, softness, etc.
Check the final drive bearing for wear or rough running, and the seal for damage.
Inspect the rear sprocket teeth for wear, damage and chips.
Check the wheel/hub bearings for damage, pitting, and cracks.
Check all bearing seals for damage, splits etc.
